content.en: Metamaterial optimization: Researchers are exploring the use of various algorithms to design and optimize mechanical metamaterials. These algorithms, such as topology optimization, stochastic optimization, and genetic algorithms, are being employed to create materials with specific properties, such as tailored buckling properties and extreme isotropy. Additionally, machine learning algorithms are being used to predict and design 2D metamaterial structures with tunable deformation-dependent properties. The combination of these algorithms with advanced modeling techniques is enabling the development of innovative and customizable metamaterials for various applications.
content.da: Metamaterialoptimering: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer til at designe og optimere mekaniske metamaterialer. Disse algoritmer, såsom topologioptimering, stokastisk optimering og genetiske algoritmer, anvendes til at skabe materialer med specifikke egenskaber, såsom skræddersyede bucklingegenskaber og ekstrem isotropi. Derudover bruges maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige og designe 2D metamaterialestrukturer med justerbare, deformationsafhængige egenskaber. Kombinationen af disse algoritmer med avancerede modelteknikker muliggør udviklingen af innovative og skræddersyede metamaterialer til forskellige anvendelser.
